forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Areas Of Fog then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog before 10am. Mostly sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. North wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, a gentle dance of fog begins to retreat, allowing the sun to warm the cool air. With today’s high hovering just shy of sixty degrees, the morning’s mist is yielding to a promising canvas of blue skies, though occasional wisps of cloud remain as reminders of the coastal influence. The northern wind plays softly, whispering at seven mph, carrying with it the crispness characteristic of this time of year. As the day unfurls, temperatures will gradually dip, inviting you to wrap a light sweater around yourself if venturing outside.

As night descends, expect the city to cool to a tranquil forty-eight degree hush beneath a star-strewn sky, perfect for a stroll along the Embarcadero or a quiet dinner at one of the local eateries where warmth encompasses both food and companionship. Given the pleasant day ahead, it would be ideal to embrace the outdoors—a visit to a nearby park or a leisurely walk through the vibrant streets, where the exuberance of local life unfolds.
